review: If there were 10 "stars" to hit, I would! Why did I ever wait so long to get this!? My lovely husband bought be Fire Kindle last Christmas so I could read books on Kindle. Stupidly, we bought the Chrome Stick that I can't connect my Kindle to, but the quality of Chrome Stick is awful! At first I resented having to buy another stick that APPEARED to be the same as the Chrome! BUT IT'S NOT! Using this system with the Amazon Fire TV Stick is fun, easy, responsive with no glitches. Look no more. Make no more comparisons. This is what to buy, without a doubt. I forgot to mention, when using this application, you can control your tv by speaking your requests. Although the stick comes with a remote, adding this app on your Kindle with allow you to talk your requests without using the remote. Just love this!
